sentences.sentence: She put up with it all stoically.
sentences.translation: 她坚忍地承受了这一切。

sentences.sentence: She conducted herself stoically in her time of grief.
sentences.translation: 她悲伤时，表现出奇的冷静。

sentences.sentence: This was no grim duty to which I stoically resigned, however.
sentences.translation: 然而，这并非我须坚忍顺从的痛苦职责。
